elements.text: I'm having a first crack with Bet Connect but have run into this error:

text:
Here's the code:
`client = APIClient(`
    `username="xxxxxxxxxxx",`
    `password="xxxxxxxxxxx",`
    `api_key="xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx",`
    `environment=Environment.PRODUCTION,`
    `personalised_production_url="<https://xxxxxxxapi.betconnect.com/api/v2>",`
`)`

`assert client.environment == Environment.PRODUCTION`


`# Login`
`login = client.account.login()`
I've checked all the login details and they are correct. Any ideas what the issue is? Thanks
